alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; St. Louis; St. Louis City (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 7:45PM CDT until July 14 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTY IN SOUTHWESTERN ILLINOIS...EAST CENTRAL ST. CHARLES AND NORTHEASTERN ST. LOUIS COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL MISSOURI AND NORTHEASTERN ST. LOUIS CITY... At 745 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Granite City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Granite City, Edwardsville, Pontoon Beach, Madison, Collinsville, Glen Carbon and Maryville. This also includes Confluence State Park and Horseshoe Lake State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: St. Charles; St. Louis; St. Louis City
